articles.title: The Last Of Us 2 And Ghost Of Tsushima Both Delayed, Coming This Summer - GameSpot
articles.description: It's back-to-back blockbusters as Sony announces two of its biggest PS4 games, The Last of Us Part 2 and Ghost of Tsushima, will hit within a month of each other.
articles.content: Sony has announced new release dates for two of its biggest PS4 blockbusters, both coming within the next few months. The Last of Us 2, which had been delayed indefinitely due to coronavirus, is now releasing on June 19, and Ghost of Tsushima, the next game f… [+1449 chars]

articles.title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare's Enormous Patch Size Annoys Players - GameSpot
articles.description: With another large update this week, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's file size is approaching half that of standard console hard drives.
articles.content: Since launch, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare has been steadily growing in size thanks to its frequent, large updates. Following this week's latest patch and additional DLC content, the Modern Warfare file size now occupies close to 200GB on any given platform, … [+3298 chars]

articles.title: Valve ends support for SteamVR on Mac - VentureBeat
articles.description: Valve just ended SteamVR’s support for macOS. "Legacy builds" will continue to be available. Oculus hasn't supported Mac since early dev kits.
